help.short: Name of the L3 Isolation Domain.

command.name: create

help.short: Name of the L3 Isolation Domain.

command.argGroup:

<arg type="array<@AggregateRoute_create>" var="$resource.properties.aggregateRouteConfiguration.ipv6Routes" options="ipv6-routes">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.exportPolicyConfiguration.exportPolicies" options="export-policies">
